faqs.question: Will you hate me if I don't come to the wedding?
faqs.answer: Not at all! We completely understand - it's not an easy trip. We'll miss you, but we'll still love you just the same ❤️

faqs.question: How do I RSVP?
faqs.answer: Just message us and let us know!

faqs.question: Is there a WhatsApp group?
faqs.answer: Yes! We have a group to connect with other guests, coordinate travel plans, and receive information during and leading up to the wedding. Click here to join

faqs.question: Is there a dress code for the events?
faqs.answer: We want you to feel free to dress up as you would like! Generally Indian weddings see women in colourful outfits, flowy fabrics, and jewellery. Men tend to dress similarly to the west, but more patterns and colour.

faqs.question: What can I expect from the food?
faqs.answer: There will be a delicious spread of Indian vegetarian food and desserts along with some continental options served during the wedding days.

faqs.question: Where else should I travel when I am in India?
faqs.answer: We'd love to help you plan your trip. Get in touch! We will soon share our recommendations on the website as well.
